mapper.select:
select tmp.* from ( select
from visit_log where company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and !(${field} = '' or isnull(${field} )) order by id desc limit 1000 ) tmp GROUP BY staff_id, ${field} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
mapper.insert: insert into visit_log (staff_id, company_id, feedback, image) values (#{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feedback,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into visit_log
staff_id,
company_id,
feedback,
image,
#{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{feedback,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update visit_log
staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
feedback = #{feedback,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
